abstract: Ryan McDonagh's goal with two seconds left in overtime gave the Rangers a 3-2 win in Calgary on Thursday, and the Islanders failed to sustain an offensive attack in a 4-1 loss at Tampa Bay.
snippet: Ryan McDonagh's goal with two seconds left in overtime gave the Rangers a 3-2 win in Calgary on Thursday, and the Islanders failed to sustain an offensive attack in a 4-1 loss at Tampa Bay.

headline.main: Metro Pucks: Rangers Win in Overtime; Isles Fall to Tampa Bay
